variations.name: Hazelnut
variations.recipe: 1/4 cup hazelnut liqueur to 1 quart eggnog will yield 8-10 small servings. Serve warm or cold. Finish with whipped cream & a few chopped hazelnuts.

variations.name: Coffee
variations.recipe: 1 quart eggnog + 2 cups strong coffee and 2 T. coffee liqueur. Top with whipped cream.

variations.name: Vanilla Bean
variations.recipe: 1 quart eggnog + seeds scraped from a vanilla bean or 1/2 t. vanilla bean paste; Serve with a cinnamon stick.

variations.name: Peppermint
variations.recipe: 1 qt. eggnog + heat egg nog with 1 cup white baking pieces and 1/8 c crushed peppermint candy. Serve with whipped cream and a sprinkling of crushed peppermint or candy cane.

variations.name: Apricot Brandy
variations.recipe: 1/4 cup apricot nectar and 1/4 c apricot brandy into 1 qt heated or chilled eggnog.

variations.name: Mocha
variations.recipe: 1 c strong coffee and 1/2 c chocolate syrup into 1 qt eggnog. Top with whipped cream and shaved chocolate.
